sentences.english: There is a Mauritanian mercenary who is 14 years old.
sentences.chinese: 有一个毛里塔尼亚雇佣兵才14岁。

sentences.english: Camp Followers and Sword Sisters now get Power strike skill.
sentences.chinese: 雇佣兵和女剑士现在得到了强击技能。

sentences.english: Many Armenian troops from there earn their living as mercenaries fighting for anyone who can pay them.
sentences.chinese: 许多当地的亚美尼亚军队从事佣兵生涯为金钱效命。

sentences.english: Updated two Act 5 mercenary names to Klar and Tryneus.
sentences.chinese: 第五幕增加两个雇佣兵名字。

sentences.english: As a member of the mercenary group, the main character falls into a trap.
sentences.chinese: 身为佣兵团一员的主角，在进入迷宫后却中了陷阱。

sentences.english: So this is the best you mangy mercenaries can do?
sentences.chinese: 这就是你们这群肮脏的佣兵能做的极限？

sentences.english: A recruitment station attracts many groups of men that are willing to attempt to fight for gold.
sentences.chinese: 佣兵招募站能够吸引众多雇佣兵前来为金钱效命。

sentences.english: A recruitment station attracts many groups of men that are willing to attempt to fight for gold.
sentences.chinese: 佣兵招募站能够吸引众多雇佣兵前来为金钱效命。

sentences.english: It is a prison for nearly 200 suspected mercenaries of the Gaddafi regime.
sentences.chinese: 它是一间关押了近200名卡扎菲政权的嫌疑雇佣兵。
增加了对雇佣兵的建筑类型。

sentences.english: The mercenary, too, could not hide his surprise.
sentences.chinese: 这个佣兵也无法隐藏他的惊讶。

sentences.english: Do Hirelings and Minions steal your experience?
sentences.chinese: 佣兵和你的手下会瓜分你的经验值吗？

sentences.english: Barbarian uprisings now empty most of the mercenary pool for that province.
sentences.chinese: 蛮族叛乱会清空该省可雇用的雇佣兵。

sentences.english: Many of these knights have turned war into a profitable career by becoming mercenaries.
sentences.chinese: 许多骑士选择佣兵生涯，在战争中大发横财。

sentences.english: A guard throws a hood over Jack’s face and carries him up the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 一名雇佣兵用头罩遮住了杰克的脸，抬着他走上楼梯。

definition: horse thief/(old) group of horse-mounted bandits
berserker (Norse warrior or fantasy role-playing character)
